entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, a wizard who has been living with his Muggle relatives, the Dursleys. He is mentioned as being ready to get his trunk and is greeted by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a wizard who has come to help Harry. He is described as 'brightly' greeting Harry and asking about his trunk.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are helping Harry. He is mentioned as winking at Harry and offering to get his trunk.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is a Muggle relative of Harry's who is hiding behind Uncle Vernon. She is described as staggering upright again after being startled by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is a Muggle relative of Harry's who is hiding behind Aunt Petunia. He is described as being 'understruck' by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: floo network
entities.description: The Floo Network is a magical system that allows wizards to travel through fireplaces. It is mentioned as being connected to the Dursleys' fireplace by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's Muggle relatives who do not understand magic. They are described as 'gaping' at Mr. Weasley and hiding behind each other.

relationships.description: Fred offers to help Harry by getting his trunk.
Aunt Petunia hides behind Uncle Vernon after being startled by Mr. Weasley.
